Title: June 2011
Content: 10 *p38418a01016* 8 a student does an experiment to measure the refractive index   for light travelling from  air into a transparent material. the student shines a ray of light through a rectangular block of the material.  the paths  of the incident and emergent rays are shown in the full size diagram below. (a) on the diagram draw the path of the ray within the block. (1) (b) (i) by measuring appropriate angles at a and b determine an average value of          you should show any construction lines and your measurements on the diagram.       give your final answer to an appropriate number of significant figures. (7)           =  a b pmt
